game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a journey to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Explore treacherous jungles, solve riddles, and overcome challenges to claim the ultimate prize!

task.description: Visit the local museum to discover the location of the treasure map.
Unravel the mystery behind the symbols on the map to reveal the hidden location.
Brave the dangers of the dense jungle to reach the marked spot on the map.

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the underground cavern
task.description: Search for the hidden lever or mechanism that opens the secret entrance.

task.objective: Defeat the guardians and retrieve the treasure
task.description: Battle the mythical creatures protecting the treasure and claim it as your own.
